value.0:
This book seems to entail an amount of knowledge on the topic of creating typical snares and traps.

All traps require a trap kit and an amount of gold pieces entailing other regular supplies involved in trap making. Typical trap making is available to druids, rangers, and rogues. Those of the assassin profession also practice these techniques.

Using a piece of iron and a trap kit, an average spike trap can be created.

Using spider silk that has not lost its elasticity, an average tangle trap can be created.

If oily flint is available, incorporating it into a trap kit will produce a trap that will set fire to the one who sets it off.
